content:
I removed the tags BFS and DFS (none of them are needed to solve the puzzle).
I replaced them by the tag Graphs.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: A quite easy but funny puzzle with more than one way to solve, I started from the target and climbed to the root.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Agree with Djoums, this is a fairly easy problem. I know the tags suggest "Binary Tree, BFS, DFS" but one can solve it (and I did) without using any of these of these methods. I think the tags can stay because we tend to associated BFS and DFS with trees but solvers will have other options.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice one
This is an easy puzzle, it only takes a few minutes to solve.
You went up from the target node?
Correct. Just navigate back up the Array from target to root.

hahaha didn't mentioned on my previous comment, but I proposed this problem for the quick matches. Got reject for its complexity, thus why I initially choose Medium.

My conclusion is that there's all kind of levels and with more contributions, we will be able to get the sweet spot of difficulty for this site.
